website_summaries.verdict: This adorable folding set is available in a range of bold hues, from mint green to canary yellow. Perfect for adding a pop of color to your patio.
pros: Table and chairs fold for easy storage

customer_reviews.title: Solid sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest bistro set ever. I ordered the mint green and it came exactly as photographed. All three pieces are heavy, stable, and sturdy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Previs

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this review and changing the number of stars from two to five as the company went overboard to satisfy my concerns. I didn’t unpack the bistro set for three months and when I did I noticed a couple places with no paint and the color wasn’t a true red. My husband had burned the packing materials and I figured it was too late to make a complaint. My original review told customers to examin the product when it is received. I still think that is good advise — for any product. The company contacted me, listened to my concerns and shipped me a new one. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JHagen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blue table of my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: This patio set is sturdy and looks exactly as pictured. Extremely high quality and sets up with almost no effort. Each piece unfolds and has a preattached piece to keep the components in place. There were a few scratches (probably from shipping) but its outdoor furniture so this was not an issue. The chairs don't wobble and are fairly comfy considering it is a metal table. The color is vibrant. I take most of my meals at this table because it is so lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute outdoor table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, and it's nice for having a meal or working on my laptop. It's reasonably comfortable, and the table and chairs all feel sturdy. After leaving it outside for a few weeks, I started to notice discoloration from rust on the chairs, so I'm concerned this set won't last as long as I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our quaint balcony space in our condo ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our quaint balcony space in our condo building. The vibrant chartreuse color couples perfectly with our retro robin egg colored door. Lightweight, already assembled and super easy to clean. The price makes this set a no brainer (Cheaper than Target, CB2, but equal in quality). Awesome summer buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nouvelle Mere

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for small space, folds nice and flat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and if u r looking for a NICE table that will fit a smaller space this is PERFECT! Another great feature is how flat this table and chairs fold down which is important because my small patio area is also in the walkway that people use to get to laundry stairs and I cant leave table up when not in use. Blue is light and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, arrived wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This little bistro set looks adorable in cheerful yellow. It fits nicely on my back deck, which is small. It is comfortable enough if you’re not planning on sitting there for hours. Unfortunately only one of the chairs is actually perfect. The table and the other chair both have a bit of a shorter leg. My husband had to keep them from wobbling by adding stick-on pads to the bottom. I’m keeping the set since it was affordable, too much of a hassle to pack back up, and most sets don’t last very long in the sea-air anyway. Would I order another one like it? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Sybille C. Denninger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So so so cute! Excellent quality and very sturdy. I ordered the one in green , it arrived perfectly packed, damage free and on time. Looks just like in the pictures. The size is right for adults. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great Set, Terrible Company
customer_reviews.text: The patio set itself is great-- big enough to be comfortable and functional, but small enough to not be overbearing in a small space. The low rating is for the company. I live in South Carolina and they delivered the box to Montana. I contacted them twice via Amazon and emailed them directly twice and never heard anything. After a week I called Amazon and they were able to tell me that it was en route, and it arrived the next day. Just not happy about never hearing from Grand Patio.
customer_reviews.author: Brandyn Zielke

customer_reviews.title: Beware of rust
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for less than 2 months and already has several many visible signs of rust. It is a white set so I’d very obvious. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gonnella

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my apartment kitchen nook, with the idea of eventually using it outdoors. The red color is the deep red pictured, and I'm happy with the purchase. The material is not cheap, it's got weight to it and (I believe) will last. It was packaged well, instructions are pictures (like Ikea), and not necessary since there was no assembly required. The little things about this set are what brings me to write a review - the simple lock mechanisms on the chair and table, the plastic feet to prevent floors being scratched. The whole design was thoughtful, and I'm delighted with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: quadruplethreat

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This set looks beautiful, but it is not a safe design! When you fold up the chair, the seat moves out away from the back, leaving room for fingers to get pinched as it folds. We had the set in use for about half an hour when my son (10 yr old) wanted to move the chair a bit, the seat slid up, and now he's got a swollen, bloody finger where it pinched him. Just be very cautious when moving or folding the chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rust after only 1 month :(
customer_reviews.text: After only one month on my patio, the chairs are starting to rust. The set will be in the garbage heap by the end of summer. Definitely not suitable for outdoor use. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pesa-Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: Literally opened the box and unfolded it. Could not have been easier. I ordered the pink one, think hot pink, or 31 Flavors lol. The deck around our pool is very small (we didn't put it in) so space is limited, but I found last summer we were moving chairs and small tables to sit by the pool when our teenagers and adult kids are in the pool. This is perfect for the space we have. The splash of color is nice. Arrived USPS--my poor letter carrier! Maybe ship via Amazon instead? For the record, I spotted this on Lowe's website for $50 more. Get it here for less if you can wait a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. Really well made and can see it lasting for years. Really nice and great pop of yellow for my yard Update: 6 mos later and still loving the quality and style of this set. Planning to buy a 2nd one. Easy to store and takes up little space.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Found this bistro set on Amazon when my local store was sold out. Very glad, too--this is in shocking pink, which looks a lot more zippy on my patio than more boring white. It shipped without unnecessary wrapping, yet everything was in excellent shape. No need to put anything together--the chairs and table fold, simply. High quality, from what I can tell, and it's as comfortable as a bistro table should be. Ideal for sipping and working out chess puzzles on a balmy evening. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lexicron

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewers, this is a great purchase for a simple bistro set. Unfolds and sets up right out of the box. Mine actually had no problems with the plastic feet, though it is being used in the yard so it wasn't a concern.The blue is a lovely shade, not too garish.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for big people.
customer_reviews.text: These look nice great color. They are not for larger people. I’m 6’5 270 and these chairs hold me but barely. Just looking for something stronger
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best Bistro Set I Have Owned!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bistro set! Cute, sturdy, easy to clean and store. Perfect size for a small deck or cute enough for inside a studio or small apt! The red is actually more of an orange color, which worked perfectly for me and matched my patio pillows perfectly! We put one the deck for our guest bedroom and our friends and family have just loved it! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: 1SandrainSF

customer_reviews.title: Grand patio premium steel bistro
customer_reviews.text: Bistro set is cute and sturdy. They sent me replacement plastic bottoms quickly to replace a few broken in shipping. Color is present pretty and fits on the skinny part of my balcony, creating a separate area from the bigger area where I have my sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ard

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, especially for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, especially for smaller spaces! It comes with 2 chairs, I have one folded and put against the wall. I love the color and the table and chairs fold pretty easily when not needed. Giving a 4 star for sturdiness only because it is a recent purchase and while it seems sturdy enough, time will tell and I will update later. 4 star for comfort because it is a metal chair so luxurious comfort isn't what I was necessarily going for. If your back or tooshie hurts, add a seat or back pad
customer_reviews.author: lupe

customer_reviews.title: Packaged poorly that led to scratches and damage
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but I can’t be fully satisfied because first it was packaged and shipped poorly. No bubble wrap or foam cushion. THAT IS WHY, my bistro set came with scratches in size of broad tip marker, which can lead to rust. Then, the white screw like thing in the bottom of the chair is broken too. I just wished they packaged it nicely because it is well made. The damages are caused by handling and shipping. Returning it would surely become a hassle since it is kinda heavy. I really like the accuracy of color and matte finish. Overall nice product. No response from the seller when asked for replacement for broken plastic part.
customer_reviews.author: Riri R. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and value
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional product! I liked the first set so much I bought another one. After the second set arrived I bought 2 more sets for my front patio for a total of 4 sets. They are very sturdy and heavy. Will not blow over and the chairs will accommodate a heavier adult. They fold nicely and will be easy to store. (Should I get a red set?!)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is super cute. I like how it's all foldable for easy storage. The chairs have pegs to secure the chairs when they are open, so they can't close up while someone is sitting in then, that's a plus for those who have small kids!
customer_reviews.author: 3GRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This patio is so cute it’s exactly as described! I love the look and loves that it folds!
customer_reviews.author: Lee H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking patio set but beware of broken feet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set but as we were unpacking the box, we noticed that almost all of the protective feet were broken or missing. So disappointing. Had to return. Also the shipping box was retaped and looked like it had been returned before.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Magruder

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this set in red the first time and was delivered blue. sent it back and the red was no longer available for prime but the yellow set was which is what we initially wanted but wasn't on prime. so ordered again after a smooth/quick return and received the yellow set with no complaints. looks so bright and cute. no assembly other than unfolding. cant wait to sit out in the sun with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the black set I have just received. It is for my small balcony and fits perfectly. I was concerned that perhaps the chairs would not accommodate my 240 lb, 5'6' frame, but they are surprisingly roomy and comfortable. And the table is the perfect height for my computer. The set arrived only a few days after I placed my order and was in perfect condition. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ZenReview

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for a bistro set!
customer_reviews.text: We've owned several bistro sets over the years. This set is hands down the most comfortable of them all! How they've made it more comfortable: the edges are rounded, the slats are wider, the weight capacity is high. Also, it's lighter than other sets we've had, while still being sturdy. Our aunt hated our old bistro sets, HATED them, and she is happy to sit on these. We are buying another set. Photos to come soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size for a cup of coffee with a friend. It is super easy to set up, as you just take it out of the box and basically unfold it; you don’t have to bother with any tools which is nice. It’s a lovely addition to my front porch and I’m really happy with it. The only thing I’m not terribly fond of is that the chairs are slightly uncomfortable, so I wouldn’t get it if you’re planning on sitting there for several hours or something (like cookouts, parties, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Kerra

customer_reviews.title: Rusty after one weekend of rain
customer_reviews.text: It started rusting after the very first rainfall. And I wiped it down as soon as it was over. This was from the next morning. It’s been a very rainy month, sometimes showering down without it being on the radar. I can’t worry about wiping it down all the time. I know it’s steal but I thought I’d be able to get a couple summers out of it. At this rate, I don’t see it lasting past this season.
customer_reviews.author: Jalena

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good but lighter gauge than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how comfortable the seats were. I expected to need seat cushions. But it is fine without them. The powder coat is very nice. BUT, the steel is not as heavy as I expected. It remains to be seen how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn E.

customer_reviews.title: Table is not leveled, and wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: $109 for a table that’s not leveled. Big disappointment. The chairs are decent, a bit heavy which is good. But to spend $109 for a set and the table that’s not leveled is sad. I had to remove two of the table stoppers on the bottom of the feet just so the table could sit a little properly, & that’s that the table still wobbles. Honestly they’re cute, but who wants a table that wobbles? Not a student like me. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs are made well and fold and unfold easily. I like the clean and simple look on our front porch. There are no sharp edges that could scratch people or surfaces. The chairs are comfortable enough for that type of chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Delightful  and just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is just how I wanted it to be! These are sturdy pieces in a true bright red. They are matte so they may seem like brick red in the photo but as you can see they go great in our red garden. Love these and I plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. They are really pretty, took no assembly and are very functional for the money. Love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: RG1

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Great patio set for a great price! Being at home more, having more space and places to enjoy things outside has become key for us. It came quickly, packed efficiently and was easy to set up. My neighbors have a similar set and we have all agree that these chairs are more comfortable. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: Affordable on-trend product. Did start to see some rust after leaving it out in the rain for days, but it not too bad and luckily they are easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Csilla Toth

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great little bistro set! I have it on my back deck, and I'm considering ordering another one for my front porch. The chairs are very sturdy, and the table is bigger than I expected (good thing). No assembly - just unfold and bam. I bought non-slip padded chair covers for it. I am sitting in one of the chairs as I type this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lana in Independence

customer_reviews.title: No assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This bistro set is exactly what was pictured. Love the color....mint would be my best description. Even better is that they were packed beautifully and completely assembled....just lifted them out of the box for instant seating! I plan to spray the underside, folding areas, and screw assemblies with WD40 to help prevent rusting, but the powder coating looks very well done. It will be used on an uncovered patio.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Beyond happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. I was a little worried about it as there are strong winds where I live. I was hoping it would be heavy enough to not be knocked over, but they are very heavy and sturdy. I don’t think the wind will be an issue. The blue is a beautiful color! And they are super easy to set up. All you have to do is take them out of the plastic and unfold them. Very great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and made to last
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bistro set that has all of the qualities I was looking for. I like it because it's easy to clean, just wipe off the metal slates. The chairs are quite heavy and sturdy, and the table is a good size. We now have two of these sets. The colors are really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: pastrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This table chairs set is top quality all the way! Just pull them from the box and open them up! No assembly at all. The color is a beautiful slightly smoky French blue. The paint is flawless. This is just the right size for an apartment dweller! I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: NEB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect timing during Covid.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bistro set. Fits perfectly on my small porch near the river. I pretend I’m at a restaurant having coffee, lunch or dinner in Europe or anywhere in the country while on isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Goldiernhawn

customer_reviews.title: a GREAT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Priced VERY reasonably! This item arrived exactly on time. Set was exactly as described. It was well packaged. My wife LOVED it. Quickest installation ever because NO ASSEMBLY required!....AND you can easily fold up the chairs and table and hang them up for winter storage!! A GREAT buy!!
customer_reviews.author: George L. Guttler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely patio set and perfect for my small shady patio. It is easily set up and will be easy to fold up and store for the winter. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. It's very sturdy and very well put together. All I had to do was take it out of the box and unfold...it was that easy. I bought this set for a small patio next to my kitchen...when the weather cools down, it's the perfect setting for a cup of coffee ... The color is exactly as pictured and the price for the quality is great. Thinking about buying a second set for my bedroom balcony...
customer_reviews.author: EST

customer_reviews.title: Looks super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, good for the price. Can't imagine it will hold up for the long run but its cute in the mean time. My only complaint is the little plastic pieces it has to protect the ends and snap the chairs open. Not all of the fit properly and they are a bit of an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and well priced
customer_reviews.text: I love this patio set. I ordered the red and it is a great color. The set is attractive and sturdy. My patio is fairly small and the set fits just right. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lois G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have this table and chair set in my garden, and EVERYONE compliments me on their attractiveness. I can have morning tea and afternoon wine on the table. During Covid, my husband and I have sat on the chairs in our driveway to talk with suitably distanced neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Cissiefitz

customer_reviews.title: The table and chairs are made of steel and seems pretty durable, but is painted in a bright green ...
customer_reviews.text: As a cozy bistro set, this set of patio table and chairs works just as it is meant to be. The table and chairs are made of steel and seems pretty durable, but is painted in a bright green color (for mine, but other colors available) and looks stylish. The set was shipped in triple-packed boxes for good protection during transporting, and it is supper easy to get them assembled and set up (almost like ready to be used out of box). I set them up under a pergola in the backyard, and has used them a few times for reading books while drinking coffee. Overall, I am quite satisfied with the table and chairs set.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Little Table and Chair
customer_reviews.text: It folds beautifully!. It feels very sturdy; I'm not tiny and I felt comfortable and secure. The Peacock Blue is a little darker than I expected, but it is very nice. I highly recommend this for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cloninger

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: The set is a beautiful shade of red and it arrived without any scratches or dents. The table sits flat without rocking. The chairs are reasonably comfortable. It needs to be folded away when not in use as it is relatively light in weight and will be blown off its feet by wind gusts. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great bistro set!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my yellow bistro set for the balcony in my apartment! The yellow is vibrant, is is a quality set that had not faded or worn in the elements of the Northeast winter. I would but this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL COLOR, NO ASSEMBLY AND VERY EASY TO FOLD. MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS IF YOU DO NOT HAVE MUCH PADDING ON YOUR --- LIKE ME, CHAIR PADS ARE REQUIRED WHICH I PURCHASED AND ALL IS WELL ON MY VERANDA. NICE PRODUCT. SINCERELY, DENISE
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful, but some of the bottom plastic footing started to fall off, But I would buy something a little Sturdier. Needed to by the cushions for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Firestorm11

customer_reviews.title: Item Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a dent on the table that ckearly did not happen during shipping as shipping packaging was in good shape. Also, a chair leg was missing the soft cushion-like no skid plastic piece. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised to open this today and find it . . . Exactly as pictured and described. It’s adorable and sturdy and it required no assembly and I’m kinda in shock.
customer_reviews.author: Betterer

customer_reviews.title: Not true red but beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a true red color and it's more of a gorgeous orange color (at least to me). Thankfully that will work for me as it's a temporary solution in my kitchen until the remodel is done. After that, it'll look amazing on the front porch. I was pleased with the ease in setting it up and it has braces to keep it from folding up while using it. It's sturdy enough for what it's intended for. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Some paint damage
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this patio set. One of our chairs arrived with paint damage and it looks scraped on that spot. That same chair also doesn’t open up completely; The part you sit on raises up and doesn’t seem to “lock” in completely unless someone is sitting on it, and raises up as soon as you stand. Were it not for these two things I’d give it a higher star rating :)
customer_reviews.author: IGR

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality for the price$ Just what I was wanting. This is not a fake review. Just so y’all know 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Sandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Color is true to the photo and I love this bc it folds really flat for easy storage in the winter. Looks so good on my back porch. Probably not big enough to have a proper meal at but large enough to have some wine, cheese, and a chat.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Marshall Lundeen

customer_reviews.title: A great patio bistro set for smaller spaces!
customer_reviews.text: For a small deck, these are the best! I love that I can fold them up quickly and they look great! They take up far less space than having standard patio furniture. Perfect for having coffee outside in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Quality build on this set - surprisingly sturdy! I've had it outside for over a month in central Florida rains and sun, with zero aging or rust. The seats are uncomfortable after sitting for a while, so I'm going to make cushions.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: French press
customer_reviews.text: This cheerful set of chairs and a table Transformed our front yard into A perfect place to have a cup of coffee and enjoy the view. The set seems well made at a great price. It was hard to decide which of the colors to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chieco

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for what I needed. Very cute yellow. It is small and doesn't take up a lot of space. Is comfortable for what it is but I don't sit in it for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: They promise replacement nylon feet if broken. Ignored!
customer_reviews.text: They promise replacement nylon feet if broken. They're flimsy and product in box had snapped-off (broken) nylon feet. Despite two requests by Amazon and me to replace feet, we have been totally ignored. Avoid purchasing "wobbly" set right out of the poorly packed box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grant Wealleans

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: To update: Never got response back from company. Do NOT recommend! Not happy that items arrived without proper quality control. Bubble in table on top. Chair marked up in 3 places. Requested new chair. No response yet. Hoping to hear soon. Set is very cute. Wanted it in good condition. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Cute yellow patio set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute patio set. I love the color. It fits my balcony perfectly. It even added a pop of color to my building as everyone else’s patio furniture is black. My only con is that one of the chairs was scratched upon opening the package. It’s a small imperfection, otherwise the set would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nursinggirl4

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bistro table!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bistro table and chairs set! I have two in my back and side yard. Came in perfect condition, is easy to fold and unfold. The color is exactly as pictured! Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GLENNA ROSE RITT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our patio. Love the color of it and it’s metal so it’s more durable. Love that we can just fold it up for the winter. Great place for my morning coffee. Very happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Booklover83

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent furniture addition
customer_reviews.text: We have been using them on our patio for 2 weeks now. So far, they feel very sturdy, weather resistant, easy to clean and despite the light color, stains are not that noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bistro set. It is heavier than I thought but that is a good thing. I got some chair cushions to put on that make the seating more comfortable. Some of the pads on the legs were broken off and the seller immediately sent replacements. Just be careful when you are folding the chairs so you don't get bumped in the shin.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bistro set.
customer_reviews.text: This bistro set is absolutely beautiful and very sturdy. Delivery was prompt after we ordered it.Do not hesitate to order this if you are looking for a bistro set.We have the blue set and it is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, looks good, practical and cheap
customer_reviews.text: We like this Bistro set at this good price. The color is great, comfortable enough, easy to move but still stable, steady and strong enough, small but cozy and good for two, its fun.
customer_reviews.author: Reds

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, great quality and a sturdy patio bistro set packaged nicely for safe delivery to Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Great! Order it!
customer_reviews.text: This little bistro set is absolutely great! Fairly heavy so it won’t blow away in every thunderstorm. Very compact but comfortable. No assembly required and folds easily. Adds beautiful color to my sliver of a desk. Worth the cost for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest patio set around!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I solve my mosquito problem, I'll be using it more. But I had a nice breakfast with my boyfriend on it and it met all our needs and wants. Sky blue is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Nat's

customer_reviews.title: Color is Off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red table. It’s actually more a reddish-orange than red. I like it, but really wanted a bold, red table for summer. The color I received is probably better suited for fall.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 20 days early, even before the cushions! Everything sturdy, chairs a bit uncomfortable without cushion. Love the set! PS our cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Well priced for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small and easy to move around - yet sturdy - and very cute. Not terribly comfortable but really not designed for that, though I suppose one cut put a cushion on the seat if desired. Well priced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberjimt

customer_reviews.title: So cute and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my rooftop patio. It turned out beautifully! I don’t know how they’ll hold up over time but it was nice to finally receive something I didn’t have to put together myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ayubi

customer_reviews.title: Your furniture my end up in Montana
customer_reviews.text: I live in Wisconsin and my Patio Set was delivered to Bozman MT !!! Trying to get a refund or another set of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Great item - sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the quality of this product. I was expecting something much more flimsy for the price. It is well made and very comfortable. With care, I will be using this for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived very well packed, not a scratch on it. The paint job is perfect, a vibrant shade of yellow. Looks just like the pictures. Comfort is as expected for metal furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful tables and chairs good quality well made. These did not even move in my yard during 35 mph gusts. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurahp1961

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Sturdy, artistic, color is perfect. Where I will have my morning coffee & chat with friends. Great for small spaces. Simple & fun. Chairs are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: louise volintine

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Ths was perfect for my back porch for the two of us. Easy to fold so when the weather gets bad, I can easily bring it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little table to put on my small balcony. It’s the perfect size and easy to fold ! I love the color too. It’s durable and comfortable enough to sit on outside . A good value for the money .
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: great bistro set
customer_reviews.text: love this set. looks great and love that it can be folded and stored away if we need more space in our screened in porch. Got it in yellow and is true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table is great chairs are comfortable, color is adorable, plastic feet skids are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Nice and heavy. Not cheap at all. Love the color and the price wasn’t too bad. Coffee on the balcony every morning with this adorable table.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy, and I love the color. It's a delightful dash of red in my garden. Plus, the table and chairs are easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: WanderingReader

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love our new table and chair set! It’s so bright and colorful although it did arrived chipped on one of the chairs :(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set & Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the set! Sturdy but still lightweight, which was what I wanted since I live in an apartment & wanted to be able to move it easily when time comes. The color is nice too but looks slightly more greenish than pictures - though not turquoise. Good value but took long to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia O

customer_reviews.title: Serves purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my upstairs porch. It’s just large enough for two. The blue is much brighter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: McK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patio Set!
customer_reviews.text: The patio arrived just in time for spring/summer. The table is perfect size for a bottle of wine and dinner in the evening or a cup of coffee and book in the morning. Everything was in tact and no parts were missing. I’m very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bistro on the pier
customer_reviews.text: Bought it too keep in a dock box, wanted easy flat fold and sturdiness for use on the pier. We even feel safe on the narrow finger pier, it is very sturdy and safe. The only reason I gave it 4 stars on comfort is that when we are not eating and just want a chair to sit out and talk to friends it's not as comfortable as a chair with arms, but then again that's not what I ordered!!! All in all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Color is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Color is bold and pretty. Table is great size in per portion to chairs. I have it set up as a checkers table, looks adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Great bistro set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I ordered it in the light blue and use it in my garden. It has no issues sitting correctly with a pea stone groundcover and the set is very sturdy. Comes ready to open right out of the box so no assembly required. I have had it for about a week and use it everyday so far.
customer_reviews.author: Roshi74

product_meta.title: Grand patio Premium Steel Patio Bistro Set, Folding Outdoor Patio Furniture Sets, 3 Piece Patio Set of Foldable Patio Table and Chairs, Mint Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Mint GreenOur Grand Patio Parisian stylish outdoor bistro set includes garden table and chairs, which are outdoor powder coated. Our garden furniture sets are concise, beautiful and sturdy. These pub table and chairs also has plastic cushions on foot and the joint for protection. This outside furniture is certainly the quality modern outdoor furniture you can't miss. 

These metal constructed outdoor table and chairs adopt a bright color, which creates a unique artistic style. This metal outdoor furniture gives you the most wonderful view while enjoying yourself. 

These awesome bistro table and chairs set don’t only offer you a quiet moment with a cup of drink or several great books outdoors but also give a comfortable seating for your distinguished guests. This wrought iron bistro set will definitely change your life style, making your life wonderful. You will fall in love with outdoor living.

The 3 piece bistro set could be placed in your Patio, Backyard, Balcony, Roadside, Bistro and so on.

Our durable and small patio set are easy to setup and fold for storage. No assembly required. These outdoor furniture sets are also so easy to clean. These outside table and chairs can save your precious time and space.

Specification:
Set includes: 2 PCS of chairs, 1 PC of table
Material: Steel
Color: Mint Green
Chair size: 23"(D) X 19.5"(W) X 32"(H). 
Table size: 23.6"(DIA) X 28"(H). 
Overall Product Weight: 48lb
Notice: You can contact Grand patio for replacement if these plastic foot pieces are missing. 
Type: Lawn furniture, deck furniture, porch furniture, bistro set indoor, kitchen bistro set, backyard furniture, outside table and chairs.
feature_bullets: Powder coated steel frame structure, rust-resistant. Perfect for outdoors, even coastal living. Space saving, easy to carry and storage.

Premium Edition: Stylish design, wide and thick bars on the seat panel and back make it comfortable and strong. Plastic pieces on the each foot, keep your floor from scratching. Notice: You can contact Grand patio for replacement if these plastic foot pieces are missing.
Heavy-duty construction yet light weight chairs can hold up to 300 lbs respectively.
No assembly required, easy to set up and fold. Maintenance free, simply clean with wet cloth.
Size of Table: 23.6"(DIA) X 28"(H). Chair: 19.7"(D) X 16.5"(W) X 32"(H)
